name: RAMS
overview: RAMS is a German language text adventure developed by Nikolaus M. Heusler. It was published in 1990 by Markt & Technik in 64'er Sonderheft 52. You are a top agent of the American secret service SOA (Secret Open Access) and have a responsible task: A mad scientist has developed the »R.A.M.S.«, the Reactor for the destruction of the human soul. With this he was able to wipe out the entire population of the earth. The mad professor is blackmailing the governments of the world with this infernal machine. All he cares about is bare mammon. So much for the history of this adventure. If you think you're capable of stopping the madman.
